page.title: 15NEW FOUND LEISURE PURSUITS
page.content: Our area of the Eastern Valley has a high unemployment rate so more people now find themselves with extra leisure time. Pontypool Park,originally the grounds of the Hanbury family home was acquired for the town in 1920.The house is now a school whilst the park contains the stadium for the renowned Pontypool Rugby Football Club,a dry ski slope,sports centre,and play area.The ski run consists of brushes laid over a grassy slope with a drag lift to aid the skiers' ascent. The leisure centre offers sports as diverse as subaqua diving,judo,rock climbing,gymnastics,snooker,swimming and many others for a modest fee.The sports hall is the venue for shows and concerts.Participation in many leisure activities is now easily available for all.
